Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Here we describe UBE3A coding - region mutations detected by SSCP analysis in 13 AS individuals or families .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| AS (Angelman Syndrome) |

Note: I am assuming that "AS" in the text stands for "Angelman Syndrome," which is a genetic disorder. If "AS" stands for something else in this context, please let me know.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |

| AS (Angelman Syndrome) |

Note: In the given paragraph, "UBE3A coding - region mutations" and "SSCP analysis" are genetic mutations and analytical techniques, respectively, and not diseases. Therefore, I have only included "AS" as the valid disease entity.
